name: Aero Para Club der Kempen (APCK)
about: The Aero Para Club der Kempen (APCK), located on the reserve NATO airfield of Oostmalle-Zoersel (EBZR), has been a vibrant aviation community for over 40 years. As a recognized training school for private pilots, APCK offers both theoretical and practical training using its fleet of club aircraft. The club also hosts a gliding club and a group for amateur aircraft builders. With four club aircraft and around 15 private aircraft on site, APCK provides a comprehensive flying environment. The airfield, under military supervision, is a protected European natural reserve, ensuring a harmonious balance between nature and aviation. APCK welcomes members and visitors alike, offering a welcoming space to enjoy flying and the surrounding natural beauty. Whether you are a seasoned pilot or just starting your aviation journey, APCK is an ideal place to pursue your flying dreams.
